properties.name: grpc.auto-register-grpc-stubs.enabled
properties.description: auto register switch of grpc stub.

properties.name: grpc.server.core-pool-size
properties.description: the core pool size of the grpc server thread pool.

properties.name: grpc.server.maximum-pool-size
properties.description: the maximum pool size of the grpc server thread pool, use 'directExecutor' when it is 1.

properties.name: grpc.server.threads-queue
properties.description: the queue size of the grpc server thread pool.

properties.name: grpc.server.max-inbound-message-size
properties.description: the maximum number of requests that grpc server can accept.

properties.name: grpc.client.use-plain-text
properties.description: specifies whether to use plain text transmission.

properties.name: grpc.client.max-inbound-message-size
properties.description: the maximum number of requests that grpc client can transmit.
